item.title: New VMScape attack breaks guest-host isolation on AMD, Intel CPUs
item.description: A new Spectre-like attack dubbed VMScape allows a malicious virtual machine (VM) to leak cryptographic keys from an unmodified QEMU hypervisor process running on modern AMD or Intel CPUs. [...]...
